turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to place a pizza order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what pizzeria do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what kind of pizza's would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like three large. And I'd like them to be the first one, just plain cheese. And the second one, I'd like to make it the veggie lovers. And the third one, I'd like the Hawaiian.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, bella luna's has a special 4 cheese pizza, would you like that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's great. And can I have them all thin crust, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me add that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any sides to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. Could I add an order of hot wings and an order of breadsticks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like ranch or marinara for your breadsticks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ranch Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas with thin crust, 1 4 cheese pizza, 1 veggie lovers, 1 hawaiin.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 order of hotwings, 1 order of breadsticks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 order of hotwings, 1 order of breadsticks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with ranch.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me calculate the cost.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be $88.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Sure, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in tonight?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your order will be ready in about 40 minutes but you are more than free to go early.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, but thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your dinner.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
